model.gameoflife

Class NextGenerationWorkers

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.gameoflife.NextGenerationWorkers

  • public final class NextGenerationWorkers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class constructs worker threads and splits the board into segments
    See Also:
    Thread, Board, Algorithm, Runnable
